content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 92
content.description: Update patch notes covering all changes made to the sandbox detections since early December 2022, broken down by week.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 91
content.description: Week’s update blogpost covering new signatures and configuration extraction for XWorm RAT, a new extractor for LucaStealer to expand existing detections, and updates to our rules to handle new variants of SnakeKeylogger and Erbium Stealer.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 90
content.description: Update blogpost covering new support for Strela, Bluefox and Laplas stealers; Rekoobe Linux trojan; Zeon, Royal and Venus ransomwares; and TianSpy Android stealer. Also includes improvements for Gozi, njRAT, Colibri, AgentTesla, Phorphiex and Amadey configuration extractors; plus updates to detections for Redline, Vidar, IcedID and Joker families.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 89
content.description: Update blogpost covering new signatures for Azov ransomware and Screencap keylogger and configuration extraction for Ratmilad Android spyware. Also covers extraction improvements for Emotet, AgentTesla and Qakbot; updated rules for recent Raccoon stealer samples; and fallback rules for recent obfuscated Redline stealer samples.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 88
content.description: Update blogpost for October covering: Ramnit and Lokibot; fixes for Cryptbot v1/v2, Oski, and Qakbot configuration extraction; and improvements to avoid conflict between Masslogger and ZLoader results. Also includes new detections for several recent ransomwares and new rules and configuration extractors for many Linux, Android and Windows families.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 87
content.description: Weekly update blogpost introducing support for Zingo Stealer plus signatures/configuration extraction for Lumma Stealer and NullMixer dropper. Also covers updated rules and configuration extraction for a new Cryptbot version, and improvements to detection for BumbleBee and Allcome Clipbanker.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 86
content.description: Weekly update blogpost introducing new signatures and configuration extractors for Erbium stealer, BUGHATCH downloader, Zanubis Android banking trojan, and Irata Android RAT. Also includes updates to support new variants of MarsStealer and Vidar stealer, plus fixes for the AgentTesla configuration extractor to avoid invalid output.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 85
content.description: Weekly update blogpost covering new signatures for Moisha and Blackbasta ransomwares, and configuration extractors for Asbit RAT and FFDroider stealer. Also includes updates to existing rules for the Mirai malware family and improved signature and configuration extraction for BumbleBee, along with general ransomnote handling tweaks.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 84
content.description: Weekly update blog covering new detections and updates for malware families deployed over the last week.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 83
content.description: Weekly update blog covering new detections and improvements for Lightning framework, Revive and Spynote Android RATs, Eternity framework, XtremeRAT, Gootloader and Lockbit.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 82
content.description: Weekly update blog covering changes for Warzone, Bandook, Raccoon, BlackMoon, BRATA, Merlin, DarkyLock, and CryLock.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 81
content.description: Weekly update blog covering updates for Maui, Hades, Surtr, Hermit, Phorphiex, Wellmess, Ermac 2, Danabot and Vulturi families.

content.subject: Triage Thursday Ep. 80
content.description: Weekly update blog covering new updates for Buer, Kutaki, SessionManager, OrBit, Joker and Bahamut.

content.subject: Acquisition News and Detection Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog, this week announcing the acquisition of Hatching by Recorded Future. Also detection updates for ColdStealer, YTStealer, Blister Loader, Escobar, Malibot, and DNSCat2.

content.subject: Raccoon v2 and Other Detection Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog covering detection updates for Raccoon, PrivateLoader, IceXLoader, Symbiote, and SectopRAT families.

content.subject: BumbleBee Fix and New Extractors
content.description: Weekly update blog covering a fix for garbage data in BumbleBee configs, as well as new extractors for Octo, Nymaim, and PureCrypter families.

content.subject: New Family Additions
content.description: Weekly update blog documenting new detections and configuration extractors including Emotet, Panda Stealer, NetDooka, RecordBreaker, SVCReady, WinDealer, Tsunami and AbstractEmu.

content.subject: Support for Eternity Project and EnemyBot, Plus Family Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog covering detection improvements for AsyncRAT, Emotet, EternityProject, EnemyBot and Vidar.

content.subject: A Few Weeks of Configuration Extractor and Detection Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog covering updates from the last few weeks, including a number of additions to configuration extractors.

content.subject: Qakbot, BumbleBee, Gh0stRAT and Redline Improvements
content.description: Weekly update blog covering new and improved detections for Qakbot, BumbleBee, Gh0stRAT and Redline families.

content.subject: SAML Release and Family Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog introducing SAML support. Also covering new and improved detections for Danabot, Sality, Emotet, IcedID and BumbleBee.

content.subject: Emotet x64 and Other Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog covering new Emotet x64 variant, updates for Vidar, Blackguard, Cryptbot, and Bumblebee. Plus new support for FFDroider, Modiloader and Gimmick.

content.subject: UPX Unpacking and Family Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog introducing UPX unpacking at static analysis. Also family and configuration extractor updates for Redline stealer, BumbleBee, MetaStealer, Qakbot, Industroyer2, and Matanbuchus loader.

content.subject: Configuration Extractor Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog covering detection and configuration extractor updates for BlackGuard stealer, PurpleFox rootkit, AsyncRAT, PlugX and Hive ransomware.

content.subject: ssdeep Support, General Improvements & Family Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog covering recent updates including the addition of ssdeep hashes and improved ransomnote handling. Also signature updates for BlackCat ransomware; Bandook RAT; PlugX; and Gozi.

content.subject: Maldoc Handling Updates and Family Detections
content.description: Weekly update blog introducing changes to Triage’s Office file handling for encrypted documents and XLM macros. Also detection improvements for HermeticWiper, HermeticRansom, HermeticWizard, IsaacWiper, AgentTesla, Jupyter stealer, and Prometheus ransomware.

content.subject: Greater Filetype Support, Family Updates, and New Coniguration Extractors
content.description: Weekly update blog introducing new, more flexible filetype support. Plus detections for CryptBot, PlugX, Xenomorph, BlackGuard, and Jester.

content.subject: New Family Detections and MHT File Support
content.description: Weekly update blog covering detection improvements for IcedID, Pony stealer, Emotet, Outsteel, Saintbot, 44Caliber. Also added support for MHT file format.

content.subject: Updates for IcedID, Mercurial, Allcome and Qakbot
content.description: Weekly update blog covering detection improvements and additions covering IcedID, Mercurial Grabber, Allcome Clipbanker, and Qakbot.

content.subject: New Versions and New Families
content.description: Weekly update blog covering updates and additions for Matiex, SnakeKeylogger, PurpleFox, Mars Stealer, Redline, DCRat, Matanbuchus loader, Vidar, and the TargetCompany and Koxic ransomware families.

content.subject: Updates for AgentTesla, GoldDragon, BlackCat and Trickbot NWorm
content.description: Weekly update blog covering detection improvements for AgentTesla and GoldDragon. Also a new configuration extractor for Trickbot’s NWorm module and detections for the recent BlackCat ransomware.

content.subject: Emotet Epoch 5 and other version updates
content.description: Weekly update blog covering detections for new variants of Emotet, Redline, Flubot and OnlyLogger families. Also initial handling of Babadeda crypter.

content.subject: New Year, New Family Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog introducing detection updates for Danabot, PseudoManuscrypt, Rook ransomware, Modiloader, Arkei stealer, FlagPro, and PhoenixStealer families.

content.subject: A Year in Review, Plus Detection Updates
content.description: A special edition of our weekly update blogpost, taking a look back over 2021 and the achievements with Triage. Also including a summary of recent updates and detection changes.

content.description: Weekly update blog covering the week’s changes to Triage, including backend improvements and updated family detections.

content.subject: Emotet Updates, and BazarLoader Emulation
content.description: Weekly update blog covering updated detections for the return of Emotet, improved BazarLoader handling, and other changes for SystemBC, Gozi RM3, Vidar, and Arkei.

content.description: Weekly update blog introducing signatures for the new SquirrelWaffle family, coverage for Numando trojan, and general configuration extractor and detection updates.

content.subject: Preview of Phishing Analysis
content.description: We’re doing something a little different for this week’s Triage Thursday blogpost. Over recent weeks we have been working on a new set of functionality for Triage to support analysis and rating of phishing URLs which would not normally trigger behavioural detections. Although it is still in early stages, in today’s blogpost we’ll be showing something of a sneak preview of the current state and our goals with the project.

content.subject: Family Detection Updates
content.description: Weekly update blog covering a large set of new and updated family detections.

content.subject: Custom Yara Support
content.description:
Welcome back to another entry in our Triage Thursday update blog series. We’ve got a bit of a special one today, as we’re pleased to be able to announce a major new feature for Triage. In this post we’ll take a look at the new feature, and demonstrate how to use it.

So what is this new feature? Well you’ve probably already seen the title but you can now use your own custom Yara rules in Triage analyses! Add your rules through our new in-browser editor, and they will be run against analysis files just like our own built-in rules.

content.description: Taking a closer look at the analysis flow of Cuckoo Sandbox and all the components responsible for the automated malware analysis process.

content.subject: Release of Cuckoo-compatible onemon Windows kernel driver
content.description: First release of our Cuckoo-compatible Windows kernel driver.

content.subject: The Tech Behind Our PolySwarm Arbiter
content.description: Find out how we cast our vote and settle bounties. Part two in our series on our PolySwarm arbitership takes a closer look at the technical side of it all.

content.subject: The First PolySwarm Arbiter
content.description: Hatching has integrated Cuckoo Sandbox as the first Arbiter of PolySwarms threat intelligence marketplace. This is the first in a series of three blog posts on our PolySwarm Arbitership.

content.subject: LNK HTA Polyglot
content.description: A little while ago, we came across an interesting attack vector using a polyglot LNK/HTA delivery mechanism_ We were interested to see how it would fare under Cuckoo, so we built one and ran it through the analysis.

content.subject: Analysis on Locky dropper mechanisms
content.description: This analysis aims to identify common code structures and methods typically used in various droppers associated with Locky ransomware. It is based on a sample set of 2631 JavaScript samples identified as dropper scrips delivering Locky. The results are illustrated through the analysis of three samples.

content.subject: IQY malspam campaign
content.description: Analysis of a malspam campaign leveraging .IQY (Excel Web Query) files containing a Dynamic Data Exchange query to achieve code execution through native Excel functionality.

content.subject: Hooking VBScript execution in Cuckoo
content.description: Details on implementation of Visual Basic Script instrumentation for Cuckoo Monitor for extraction of dynamically executed VBScript.

content.subject: Cuckoo Sandbox 2.0.6 pentest
content.description: Thanks to our friends at Polyswarm for sponsoring a pentest of Cuckoo 2.0.6 by Cure53. The report identified some issues (non of which critical) that have been addressed and released in the 2.0.7a1 alpha release. This blogpost discusses our fixes & mitigations.
